com.example.booknet.Model

Class CurrentUser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.booknet.Model.CurrentUser

  • public class CurrentUser
extends java.lang.Object
    A singleton data structure that contains the currently logged in user data.

        public void updateUser(com.google.firebase.auth.FirebaseUser currentUser)
        called after email and password are authenticated. saves account info to CurrentUser singleton for future use

        makes username and phone blank. As later a database check will be performed to check username and phone Username and phone info will be updated after the database check.

        currentUser -
